result.execSummary:
The defendant Wade Charles Hovind was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: Dunn County Case

records.addlTxt: Pierce County DNA Proof of Submission

8:59 Defendant Wade Charles Hovind in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THorie: guilty to Ct#1. probation 1 year concurrent with current probation sentence. Nelson and Def agree.   Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to charge: Nelson stipulates to a factual basis for charge.   COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty of charge. Court: S/W 1 year, concurrent with Dunn County probation. condition: court  costs, DNA sample and surcharge.   Appeal rights are given to the defendant.
Plea hearing on August 22, 2016 at 08:45 am.
from Defendant to appear via phone for PTC.
Pre-trial conference on May 24, 2016 at 03:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Wade Charles Hovind
Current: E4211 416th Ave, Menomonie, WI 54751 United States  (Effective: 05-02-2016)
Prior: 302 Micheels Lane Apt. 7, Menomonie, WI 54751

4:48 Defendant Wade Charles Hovind in court  VIA VIDEO CONFERENCING FROM PCJ, in custody.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Liesl Nelson appeared in court via phone.   Defendant has copy of complaint.  Court reads charges and possible penalties  Defendant waives reading of the complaint  Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas not guilty. Court rec/enter plea. Thorie: $2000 signature bond with no contact. Nelson has no objection. It has not been determined if the Def qualifies for a PD. Court goes over bond conditions. Def has not been in the armed services.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 03:15 pm.
